newsitem.title: USA: AFTER THE BELL - Microsoft active.
newsitem.headline: AFTER THE BELL - Microsoft active.

text.p: A volatile day on Wall Street did not carry oveer into after-hours trading Tuesday, with only a few stocks active, traders said.
"We've got some Microsoft trading at 99-5/8, and that's right where it closedd," one trader said.
Microsoft Corp was down 7/8 during regular trading hours, but its price was nnot moving after the bell.
The New York Stock Exchange said session one volume was 31,700, compared to 837,700 on Monday. Session two volume was 192,400, while on Monday it was 2,440,597.
The New York Stock Exchange said session one volume was 31,700, compared to 837,700 on Monday. Session two volume was 192,400, while on Monday it was 2,440,597.
